M

main(String[]) - Static method in class display.TicTacToeApplication
 
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.TicTacToeDisplay
Mouse is clicked, and the x and y values are translated into a box number and a move is made
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.TicTacToeDisplay
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.TicTacToeDisplay
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.TicTacToeDisplay
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class display.TicTacToeDisplay
 
move(int) - Method in class game.TicTacToeGame
Puts an x or o on the board depending on the move number and the space Does not complete the move if the move number is greater than 9 or if the space is already full
